metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44140 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Remote attackers may delete arbitrary files in a system hosting a JSPWiki instance, versions up to 2.11.0.M8, by using a carefuly crafted http request on logout, given that those files are reachable to the user running the JSPWiki instance. Apache JSPWiki users should upgrade to 2.11.0 or later.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
